channel.title: Advance Java on Coding N Concepts
channel.description: Recent content in Advance Java on Coding N Concepts

item.title: Read PDF File in Java
item.description: In this tutorial, we’ll learn how to read a PDF file in Java using different libraries.

item.title: Convert XSD Schema to JSON using JAXB
item.description: In this tutorial, we will learn how to auto generate class files from XSD schema using JAXB task and use them to convert to Json.

item.title: Zip and Unzip Files in Java
item.description: In this tutorial, we’ll learn how to zip a file or directory into an archive and how to unzip the archive into a directory using Java core libraries.

item.title: Transform JSON-LD in Java
item.description: In this tutorial, we’ll learn how to transform a Java Object to JSON-LD and vice versa. Also learn how to verify the schema of JSON-LD.
